email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a laycan of October 15-20. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the mid-40s? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. Given the current market, the best I can offer is $48.50 per metric ton. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 sounds more reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. Just to confirm, the laycan is still October 15-20, correct? Also, could you send over the full charter party agreement for review? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Charter Party Agreement
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $48.50 works for you. Yes, the laycan remains October 15-20. I’ve attached the draft charter party agreement for your review. Please let me know if there are any additional terms or clauses you’d like to discuss. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Charter Party Agreement
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks in order. We’re good to proceed. Please confirm the final details, and we’ll get the paperwork signed. Thanks for your help on this. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent news! I’ve confirmed all the details with the vessel owner. The MV Ocean Star is booked for your shipment at $48.50 per metric ton, with a laycan of October 15-20. I’ll send over the final signed agreement shortly. Thanks for your business, and let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah
